items.content_html: A simple, lightweight tool for API documentation and testing, built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Ideal for visualizing, interacting with, and evaluating API endpoints and responses, it offers a streamlined alternative to complex platforms like Swagger, perfect for small to medium projects.
